name: Ubiquito
description:
Use your many siblings to solve intricates levels on a deserted land.

This game is a submission to Weekly Gam Jam #36

Theme : Twins

Controls :

Use arrows to move all wanderers at the same time (left & right to rotate, up to go forward). Use spacebar to restart the level if you feel blocked. Beware of the terrain, you may encouter travelators, icy floors and other deadly pits...

A game by  Kobychou & Bragou

We hope you'll enjoy it !

First Update is done, enjoy more levels, and more art !
